name: Bacon Cotija Guacamole Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: avocado, bacon, red onion, medium roma tomato, jalapeño, lime, salt, pepper, cotija cheese, tortilla chips
recipeIngredient: 1 medium Roma tomato, seeded and diced
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, combine the avocado, bacon, red onion, tomato, jalapeño, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together until fully incorporated. Sprinkle with Cotija cheese.
